product_name: Hi-Tec Total Terrain Lace Waterproof Hiking Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Weekend hikers love the Hi-Tec Total Terrain Lace Waterproof hiking shoes for women. They combine tough waterproof protection with ventilated mesh for breathable comfort on warm days. Suede-and mesh uppers are lined with a waterproof membrane. Ghillie and double-eyelet lacing creates a secure fit. Comfortable contoured midsole; nylon shank support. Hi-Tec Total Terrain Lace Waterproof Hiking Shoes for women have durable carbon-rubber outsoles for traction. Closeout.
short_description: Weekend hikers love the Hi-Tec Total Terrain Lace Waterproof hiking shoes for women. They combine tough waterproof protection with ventilated mesh for breathable comfort on warm days.
